TopicTitle: Forum bbcode question: vertical alignment within [td][/td]

Articles.Content:
I've gone mad, and spent well over an hour trying to get text to center vertically next to a picture. I've tried [td style=valign:middle] and [td=valign:middle] and also vertical-align for both, along with numerous and increasingly kooky ideas. Could I just insert some blank lines to get it approximately correct? Sure. But if I were the kind of person to live comfortably with that, I wouldn't be nearly obsessive enough to still be playing KSP after more than two and a half years.

I also saw posts here and there on the web saying that it can't be done, and others showing how it can be done, none of which worked for me. Anyone know how?

More generally, is there a reference for the codes you can use on this site? I looked in the forum FAQ and the sticky threads here and in the newcomer's forum, as well as the bbcode help page, and didn't see anything relevant.
Can't help with your alignment issue, but you can find a list of supported BBCode tags [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/misc.php?do=bbcode).
